C.USER_NAME IS NULL
) T, lvmama_pet.PERM_USER B WHERE B.USER_NAME (+)= T.USER_NAME) G, SUP_SETTLEMENT_TARGET T3 WHERE 1=1 AND G.SUPPLIER_ID = T3.SUPPLIER_ID
G.SUPPLIER_ID = #supplierId#
G.USER_NAME = #userName#
T3.SETTLEMENT_PERIOD = #settlementPeriod#
